channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump has snapped up more than $100 million in bonds since taking office
item.description: The U.S. president has purchased hundreds of bonds issued by companies, local governments and school boards.

item.title: The bond market is flashing a potentially worrisome sign about Fed rate cuts
Stocks open mostly lower as investors digest retail earnings — live updates
Carvana’s stock is falling, and Amazon is to blame
Trump calls on Fed’s Cook to resign as DOJ urged to probe mortgage-fraud claim
EVs put Ford and other automakers at a crossroads
Trump housing regulator Pulte says Fed's Cook should resign or be fired over mortgage fraud claims
item.description: Trump has targeted the Federal Reserve and its chairman, Jerome Powell, as he pressures the central bank to slash interest rates.

item.title: Trump tariff revenue expected to offset tax bill impact, S&P says in U.S. credit rating hold
item.description: S&P Global warned U.S. government debt credit ratings could "come under pressure" if political developments affect the independence of the Federal Res...

item.title: Trump expands 50% steel and aluminum tariffs to include 407 additional product types
item.description: President Donald Trump has often relied on sector-specific tariffs to enact his sprawling trade agenda.

item.title: Trump vows to target 'woke' museums with same playbook used on Columbia, Harvard
item.description: Trump's call for a repeat of his approach to colleges and universities suggests Smithsonian museums' funding could become a major pressure point.
